metaTitle: Villa Atlantis Jávea - 4BR Luxury Villa Sea Views €1.55M
metaDescription: Stunning 4-bedroom luxury villa in Jávea with panoramic sea views, pool, and 1000m² plot. Villa Atlantis offers exceptional Costa Blanca living from €1,550,000.

content.metaTitle: Villa Atlantis Jávea - 4BR Luxury Villa Sea Views €1.55M
content.metaDescription: Stunning 4-bedroom luxury villa in Jávea with panoramic sea views, pool, and 1000m² plot. Villa Atlantis offers exceptional Costa Blanca living from €1,550,000.
content.heroIntro:
Discover Villa Atlantis, an architectural masterpiece that epitomizes luxury living on the coveted Costa Blanca. Perched in the prestigious Cap Martí - El Tossalet - Pinomar area of Jávea, this extraordinary 4-bedroom villa commands breathtaking panoramic views across the Mediterranean Sea and the valley below, creating an unparalleled living experience for the most discerning buyers.

With 235m² of meticulously designed living space set within a generous 1000m² plot, Villa Atlantis seamlessly blends contemporary elegance with functional sophistication. Every detail has been carefully crafted to maximize the spectacular setting, from the elevated position that captures endless sea views to the seamless indoor-outdoor living spaces that celebrate the year-round Costa Blanca climate. This is more than a home – it's a lifestyle statement that redefines luxury Mediterranean living.

locationSection.intro:
Jávea's Cap Martí - El Tossalet - Pinomar district represents the pinnacle of Costa Blanca exclusivity, offering a perfect balance of tranquil residential living and convenient access to world-class amenities. This elevated enclave is renowned for its stunning natural beauty, with dramatic coastal views and lush Mediterranean landscapes creating an idyllic backdrop for luxury homes. The area's prestigious reputation attracts international buyers seeking the ultimate in privacy and sophistication.

The location provides the best of both worlds – peaceful seclusion within minutes of Jávea's vibrant town center, pristine beaches, and exceptional dining scene. Residents enjoy easy access to championship golf courses, exclusive beach clubs, and the charming historic center of Jávea, while being perfectly positioned for exploring the wider Costa Blanca region including Dénia, Calpe, and the cultural treasures of Valencia province.
highlights: Panoramic Mediterranean Sea and valley views from elevated position
Walking distance to prestigious Jávea Golf Club and luxury amenities
Minutes from Arenal Beach and the exclusive Parador de Jávea
Close proximity to gourmet restaurants and exclusive beach clubs
Easy access to Alicante Airport (1 hour) and Valencia Airport (1.5 hours)

propertyFeatures.intro: Villa Atlantis showcases exceptional attention to detail throughout its 235m² of luxury living space, with every element designed to maximize comfort, privacy, and the spectacular Mediterranean setting. The thoughtful layout creates distinct zones for relaxation, entertainment, and daily living, all enhanced by premium finishes and cutting-edge amenities.
features: 4 spacious bedrooms with 5 luxury bathrooms including 4 ensuite bathrooms
Spectacular panoramic sea and valley views from elevated position
Open-plan living, dining and fully equipped designer kitchen
Expansive outdoor terraces with seamless indoor-outdoor flow
Private swimming pool integrated into landscaped 1000m² garden
Secure double garage with convenient internal access
Premium finishes and contemporary architectural design
Multiple outdoor entertainment and relaxation areas
Landscaped Mediterranean gardens with automatic irrigation
Energy-efficient systems and modern home technology integration

content.investmentSection:
Villa Atlantis represents an exceptional investment opportunity in one of Spain's most sought-after luxury property markets. Jávea's prestige as a premier Costa Blanca destination continues to drive strong capital appreciation, with properties in prime locations like Cap Martí consistently outperforming the broader market. The combination of limited land availability, strict planning regulations, and growing international demand creates a compelling investment case for discerning buyers.

The luxury villa rental market in Jávea generates substantial returns, with properties of this caliber commanding premium rates throughout the extended Mediterranean season. International buyers, particularly from Northern Europe, seek exactly this type of luxury accommodation, ensuring strong rental demand and excellent capital growth potential. With Spain's Golden Visa program and favorable tax treaties, Villa Atlantis offers both lifestyle and investment benefits for international purchasers.
whyBuySection: Unparalleled panoramic sea views from prestigious elevated location in Jávea
Exceptional build quality by renowned developer Miralbo Urbana with premium finishes
Prime investment in limited-supply luxury villa market with strong appreciation history
Perfect blend of privacy and convenience - secluded yet minutes from amenities
Turnkey luxury living with pool, gardens, and designer interiors included
Excellent rental income potential in high-demand Jávea luxury market
Strategic location offering both tranquil lifestyle and easy travel connections

faqs.question: What is the total price and are payment plans available for Villa Atlantis?
faqs.answer: Villa Atlantis is priced at €1,550,000. We can arrange flexible payment schedules and work with you to structure the purchase according to your preferences. Contact us to discuss payment options tailored to your needs.

faqs.question: Can you help arrange mortgage financing for international buyers?
faqs.answer: Yes, we work with Habeno, specialists in Spanish mortgages for international buyers. They can arrange up to 70% financing for non-residents with competitive rates. Visit our Habeno partner link or contact us for a personalized mortgage consultation.

faqs.question: What makes the Cap Martí location special compared to other areas in Jávea?
faqs.answer: Cap Martí - El Tossalet - Pinomar offers the perfect combination of elevated sea views, privacy, and proximity to Jávea's best amenities. You're minutes from Jávea Golf Club, exclusive restaurants, and Arenal Beach, while enjoying a prestigious residential setting with stunning panoramic views.

faqs.question: What is included in the Villa Atlantis purchase price?
faqs.answer: The price includes the fully finished villa with premium fixtures, landscaped gardens, swimming pool, double garage, and all built-in appliances. The property comes move-in ready with contemporary furnishing packages available separately if desired.

faqs.question: What is the rental income potential for Villa Atlantis?
faqs.answer: Luxury villas in Jávea's prime locations generate excellent rental returns, typically €3,000-5,000 per week during peak season. With Jávea's extended rental season and high demand for sea-view properties, Villa Atlantis offers strong investment potential alongside personal enjoyment.

faqs.question: When will Villa Atlantis be completed and ready for occupancy?
faqs.answer: Villa Atlantis is a new construction project by established developer Miralbo Urbana. We can provide detailed completion timelines and construction schedules. Contact us for the most current delivery information and to arrange site visits.

faqs.question: What is the buying process for international purchasers in Spain?
faqs.answer: We guide you through every step: property reservation, NIE number application, legal due diligence, mortgage arrangement (if needed), and final completion. Our experienced team ensures a smooth, transparent process from initial viewing to key handover.

faqs.question: Can I arrange a viewing of Villa Atlantis and similar properties?
faqs.answer: Absolutely! We arrange personalized viewings of Villa Atlantis and can show you comparable properties in Jávea. Contact us via WhatsApp (+34 634 044 970) to schedule your viewing appointment and discuss your specific requirements.

faqs.question: Are there any additional costs beyond the purchase price?
faqs.answer: Spanish property purchases incur additional costs of approximately 10-12% including taxes, legal fees, notary costs, and registration fees. We provide detailed cost breakdowns upfront so you have complete transparency on your total investment.

faqs.question: What ongoing costs should I expect as a Villa Atlantis owner?
faqs.answer: Annual costs include property taxes (IBI), community fees (if applicable), insurance, utilities, and maintenance. For a property of this caliber, budget approximately €8,000-12,000 annually for all ongoing expenses, depending on usage and optional services like property management.

content.conclusion: Villa Atlantis represents a rare opportunity to own a piece of Mediterranean paradise in one of Spain's most coveted locations. With its stunning sea views, exceptional build quality, and prime Jávea location, this property offers the perfect blend of luxury living and investment potential. Don't miss your chance to experience the extraordinary – contact us today via WhatsApp or call +34 634 044 970 to arrange your private viewing and begin your Costa Blanca luxury living journey.
